pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2

definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Hou Yiling, English literature professor at Beijing Foreign Studies University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 北京外國語大學英語系教授侯毅凌對此表示贊同。

sentences.english: But his students at Beijing Foreign Studies University didn’t even try to hide their boredom.
sentences.chinese: 但他北京外國語大學的學生們毫不掩飾倦意。

sentences.english: There’s plenty of new thinking occurring everyday here at Beijing Foreign Studies University.
sentences.chinese: 每天在北京外國語大學都有大量的新思想產生。

sentences.english: Beijing Foreign Studies University:Good temperament, cheerful and lively.
sentences.chinese: 北京外國語大學的美女氣質不俗，開朗活潑。
